name: The probability and statistics cookbook
body:
The probability and statistics cookbook is a succinct representation of various topics in probability theory and statistics. It provides a comprehensive mathematical reference reduced to its essence, rather than aiming for elaborate explanations.

Download
--------

Latest version: [0.1](https://github.com/mavam/stat-cookbook/releases/tag/0.1) ([PDF](https://github.com/mavam/stat-cookbook/releases/download/0.1/stat-cookbook.pdf))

Build
-----

After cloning, you can build the cookbook locally via `make`. This first generates the distribution plots via R and then compiles the LaTeX source. You may have to install a few missing packages via CRAN.
